# Filter

Have adopted have made an s3 method for `filter` so it now works in a dplyresque fashion
```{r}
library(rgee)
ee_Initialize()
l8 = ee$ImageCollection('LANDSAT/LC08/C01/T1_SR')
l8 |> 
  filter(date>"2016-01-01",date<"2016-03-04")


```
